biography.bio: Michael Altobello is an actor, known for Muhammad: The Last Prophet (2002), The Vampire Diaries (1996) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Michael Altobello

biography.bio: Maikel Bailey is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), Friends for Life (2008) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Maikel Bailey

biography.bio: Wolf Jakubowicz was born in Berlin, Germany in 1930. Family escaped Berlin in 1933 and settled in Palestine where he grew up. In 1947 family migrated to the US, shortened their name to Jacobs and became naturalized citizens. Wolf, who became William Jacobs, was drafted in 1951 before becoming a citizen, and sent to the Korean front for all of 1952. Upon his discharge, he studied Drama at the Neighborhood Playhouse '53-'55 on the G.I.Bill. After graduation he was much involved in off-Broadway Theater and subsequently signed by theatrical agents, who had him change his professional name to William Sargent - which he later legalized. In 1960 he came to Hollywood for a minor film roll and stayed for the next 27 years working in T.V. and Theater. In 1987 he and his wife moved to Salt Lake City, where two years later, he opened a downtown Theater which ran for 4 seasons. He lives in Utah with his wife Patricia and their two cats - and now primarily does voice-overs.
biography.name: William Sargent

biography.bio: Ray Porter is an actor and casting director, known for Almost Famous (2000), Argo (2012) and The Runaways (2010).
biography.name: Ray Porter
